content: of chart a round 3 *k4c k1b work 6 sts as given for round 3 of 5 times k2b k1c repeat from * once more 72 sts chart a 3 times k5c repeat from * once more round 2 *k1c k2b work 6 sts as given 4 of chart a chart a 3 times k2b k1c k2b repeat from * once more 5 times k3c repeat from * once more round 7 as round 6 working round 7 of chart a round 5 as round 4 working round 5 of chart a round 6 *k3b work 6 sts as given for round 6 of chart a 60 sts 5 times k2b k1c repeat from * once more round 1 work 6 sts as given for round 1 of chart a round 7 as round 6 working round 7 of chart a 10 times 60 sts rnds 2 7 as for round 1 following each round of chart a 5 all sizes 44 sts break off c round 1 k2b k1d k3b work 9 sts as given for round using b knit 3 rnds break off b 1 of chart b k2b 3 times k1b k1d k2b k1d 44 sts round 2 k1b k1d k4b work 9 sts as given for round gingerbread stripe 2 of chart b k2b 3 times k2b k1d k1b k1d round 3 k1d k5b work 9 sts as given for round 3 of using a knit each round until you have 3 stripes chart b k2b 3 times k3b k2d of colour round 4 k3d k3b work 9 sts as given for round 4 of don t worry if you don t exactly reach the end of chart b k2b 3 times k1b k3d k1b the colour by the end of your last round round 5 repeat round 3 working round 5 from chart b join b but do not break a unless you prefer round 6 repeat round 2 working round 6 from chart b to do that round 7 repeat round 1 working round 7 from chart b you can carry the yarn across the motif section tothe next stripe section 48 sts using b knit 3 rnds round 1 k2b k1d k4b work 9 sts as given for round 1 of chart b k3b 3 times k1b k1d k2b k1d 48 sts snowflake motif band round 2 k1b k1d k5b work 9 sts as given for round join
